医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新闻医疗宣布与华盛顿世界疫苗大会建立合作伙伴关系世界疫苗大会是一系列屡获殊荣的会议和展览，经过 24 年的发展，已成为全球同类会议中规模最大、最知名的疫苗会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/News-Medical-announces-partnership-with-The-World-Vaccine-Congress-Washington.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/News-Medical-announces-partnership-with-The-World-Vaccine-Congress-Washington.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a9ef6a3-a94f-481a-9079-816f82278fdd Thu, 21 Mar 2024 11:21:00 -0400 News-Medical announces partnership with The World Vaccine Congress Washington
INTEGRA Biosciences 通过欧洲生产设施降低运输排放INTEGRA Biosciences 已完成其位于瑞士齐泽斯总部的新园区和移液器吸头制造工厂的建设。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/INTEGRA-Biosciences-drives-down-transport-emissions-with-European-production-facility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/INTEGRA-Biosciences-drives-down-transport-emissions-with-European-production-facility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3ce16ec-3e9c-47e7-b972-fd1acf0d03d6 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 10:16:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences drives down transport emissions with European production facility
新闻-Medical.net 庆祝医学科学报道 20 周年今天，世界领先的医疗和生命科学信息和新闻网站 News-Medical.net 庆祝其第一篇内容发布 20 周年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/News-Medicalnet-Celebrates-20-Years-of-Medical-Science-Reporting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/News-Medicalnet-Celebrates-20-Years-of-Medical-Science-Reporting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4ed4e3f-0c5e-44dc-91a9-0b945d5362d2 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 09:57:00 -0400
从农场到药房：转基因牛奶作为人胰岛素的新来源来自巴西的一组研究人员构建了一种慢病毒载体，该载体具有乳腺特异性表达并携带人胰岛素基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/From-farm-to-pharmacy-Transgenic-cow-milk-as-a-new-source-of- human-insulin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/From-farm-to-pharmacy-Transgenic-cow-milk-as-a-new-source-of- human-insulin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dfcff1f-da17-4683-947e-8793438c13a4 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 09:20:00 -0400 From farm to pharmacy: Transgenic cow milk as a new source of human insulin
ArgusEye 推出 AugaOne 以加速下游生物工艺开发ArgusEye 是一家实时监测生物系统的创新传感器解决方案提供商，今天宣布推出 AugaOne™ 传感器系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/ArgusEye-introduces-AugaOne-to-accelerate-downstream-bioprocess-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/ArgusEye-introduces-AugaOne-to-accelerate-downstream-bioprocess-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e3b72d2-8773-4fd1-8df8-3f268b876812 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 08:40:00 -0400 ArgusEye introduces AugaOne to accelerate downstream bioprocess development
义翘神州宣布与Rapid Novor建立服务合作伙伴关系义翘神州生物科技股份有限公司（“义翘神州”或“公司”）是一家在深圳证券交易所子公司创业板上市的生物科技公司，提供生物研究试剂及相关技术合同研究服务，欣然宣布成立服务中心与加拿大多伦多的 Rapid Novor, Inc.（“Rapid Novor”）建立合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Sino-Biological-announces-services-partnership-with-Rapid-Novor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Sino-Biological-announces-services-partnership-with-Rapid-Novor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae4db9ca-4224-419d-9133-d1ac0e9278c2 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 08:13:00 -0400 Sino Biological announces services partnership with Rapid Novor
生物工程可食用菌丝体可提高营养价值、颜色和风味米曲霉（一种用于发酵食品的食用真菌）的模块化合成生物学工具包。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Bioengineering-edible-mycelium-to-enhance-nutritional-value-color-and-flavor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Bioengineering-edible-mycelium-to-enhance-nutritional-value-color-and-flavor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16b74197-808d-40c1-a92d-037e9a2af384 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 07:41:00 -0400 Bioengineering edible mycelium to enhance nutritional value, color, and flavor
让心脏变得聪明：通过饮食和教育改变心血管健康Get Heart Smart (GHS) 计划在改善心血管健康方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Get-heart-smart-Transforming-cardioangio-health-through-diet-and-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Get-heart-smart-Transforming-cardioangio-health-through-diet-and-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9642b91b-1da6-450a-aa7e-c6e8ccb03138 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 06:45:00 -0400 Get heart smart: Transforming cardiovascular health through diet and education
梅毒的迅速上升对美洲原住民造成的打击最为严重梅丽莎·怀亚科（Melissa Wyaco）在她位于新墨西哥州盖洛普的基地负责监督大约两打公共卫生护士，他们在广阔的纳瓦霍族部落中穿梭，寻找梅毒检测呈阳性或接触过美国一度几乎根除的疾病的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Rapid-rise-in-syphilis-hits-Native-Americans-hardest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Rapid-rise-in-syphilis-hits-Native-Americans-hardest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9f9d4ec-6c9a-4558-84a1-c19c9df873d8 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 06:33:47 -0400 Rapid rise in syphilis hits Native Americans hardest
